item.description:
Join me for the second annual folk festival at Greeley Park! The music schedule will be updated when it gets released.

The festival starts at 1 PM, but we want to get there by 12:30 to get good seats. Please bring a lawn chair, suntan lotion, bug spray and snacks, if desired.
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a foil balloon attached to my chair
item.name: FAN Event: Second Annual Folk Festival
